required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observation of ImageReady™ MR Conditional Pacing System in China
clinical_study.official_title: Observation of ImageReady™ MR Conditional Pacing System in China

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the safety and efficacy of ImageReady™ MR Conditional Pacing System in Chinese subjects

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after the Pacemaker been implanted.
primary_outcome.description: Collect the subjects status during MRI visit to MRI+1 month,

primary_outcome.measure: Pacing Threshold (at 0.5 ms pulse width) comparison
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-MR scan and 1 Month post-MR Scan.
primary_outcome.description: Compare the pacing threshold (at 0.5 ms pulse width) pre- and 1 Month post-MR Scan via the pacing system analyzer.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-MR scan and 1 Month post-MR Scan.
primary_outcome.description: Compare the Sensed Amplitude pre- and 1 Month post-MR Scan via the pacing system analyzer.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 3 months after the Pacemaker been implanted.

clinical_study.condition: Chronic Bundle Branch or Branch Block

arm_group.description: Subject must have the ImageReady™ System as their initial (de novo) pacing system implant Subject has a Class I or II indication for implantation of a pacemaker according to the CSPE guidelines

study_pop.textblock: Subjects included in the MR China Study should be selected from the investigator's general patient population indicated for single or dual chamber pacemaker implantation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject must have the ImageReady System as their initial (de novo) pacing system implant
- Subject has a Class I or II indication for implantation of a pacemaker according to the CSPE guidelines5
- Subject is able and willing to undergo an MR scan
- Subject is willing and capable of providing informed consent and participating in all testing/ visits associated with this clinical study at the intervals defined by this protocol
- Subject is age 18 or above
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject has or has had any pacing or ICD system implants
- Subject has any implants or devices that are not suitable for MR scan
- Subject is enrolled in any other concurrent study that might interfere with this study
- Subject has documented life expectancy of less than 12 months
- Women of childbearing potential who are or might be pregnant at the time of this study

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University
